content.text: The Carpenter is similar to an Automatic Crafting Table from the Buildcraft Mod, except it has a specific recipe set. For example, you aren't able to automatically craft Stone into Stone Bricks.

The Carpenterâ€™s main task is the creation of Bog Earth, Humus (although there are methods to make these item without this machine, they aren't as efficient) and the [Crating] of some item and block for more compact storage.
It is also used in the creation of the Portable Analyzer and the various Woven Backpacks, among other machines, tools and item that are needed for Forestry and other mods.
